data.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
data.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.

relatedRecords.name: Strange Loop
relatedRecords.description: Strange Loop (Oct 1-3, 2020 - St. Louis) is a conference for software developers covering programming langs, databases, distributed systems, security, machine learning, creativity, and more!

relatedRecords.name: IT Pro Camp 2020
relatedRecords.description: Putting on an event of this size takes a lot of people. To keep the costs down, we need generous people like you to volunteer your time. Sign up using the button below, As a Reward, all voluteers will be able to take the certification testing on Friday evening before the event. Now how cool is that…
